R

RadioModel - Class in net.tinyos.prowler
This class is the abstract baseclass of all radio models.
RadioModel() - Constructor for class net.tinyos.prowler.RadioModel
 
radioStrengthCutoff - Variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.GaussianRadioModel
This limits the number of neighbours used to calculate interference ratio.
radioStrengthCutoff - Variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.RayleighRadioModel
limits the number of neighbours used to calculate interference ratio
random - Static variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.Simulator
 
RayleighRadioModel - Class in net.tinyos.prowler
This radio model uses the assumption that nodes are moving very often.
RayleighRadioModel(Simulator) - Constructor for class net.tinyos.prowler.RayleighRadioModel
Parameterized constructor, besides setting the simulator it also adds its clock event to it and sets the updateTime to a default value back in the past so that it is reset at the first transmission.
RayleighRadioModel.ClockTickEvent - Class in net.tinyos.prowler
Inner class ClockTickEvent.
RayleighRadioModel.ClockTickEvent(int) - Constructor for class net.tinyos.prowler.RayleighRadioModel.ClockTickEvent
 
received(int, int) - Method in interface net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.RoutingPolicy
It is used by the FloodRouting engine when a data packet is received, and this policy returned SUCCESS in accept().
receiveMessage(Object, Node) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Application
Called when a new message is arrived for this application.
receiveMessage(Object, Node) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.FloodRouting
This demultiplexes the incomming messages to the appropriate routing application.
receiveMessage(Object, Node) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.SelforganizingBackbones
 
receiveMessage(Object, Node) - Method in interface net.tinyos.prowler.SnifferIF
 
receiveMessage(Object, Node) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.TestBroadcastNode.BroadcastApplication
Stores the sender from which it first receives the message, and passes the message.
receivingStartSNR - Variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.Mica2Node
The minimum signal to noise ratio required to spot a message in the air.
remove(Object) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.SimpleQeue
 
removeApplication(Class) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Node
Visiting the elements of the application list, it removes the first with the given application class.
removeListenerApplication() - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Mica2Node
Removes the listener application.
removeRoutingApplication(Class) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.FloodRouting
Removes the routing application whose class is identical with the parameter.
reset() - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.RoutingApplication
Called inbetween two simulation runs.
reset() - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Simulator
Clears the eventQueue.
RoutingApplication - Class in net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting
This class serves as a base class for all the routing applications, all such application should be derived from this.
RoutingApplication(int, int, RoutingPolicy, FloodRouting, Class) - Constructor for class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.RoutingApplication
A parameterized constructor.
RoutingPolicy - Interface in net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting
The implementation of this class defines a state automaton, where the actions are predetermined by this interface.
run(double) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Simulator
Runs the simulation for a given amount of time.
runWithDisplay() - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Simulator
This function runs the simulation with the display.
runWithDisplayInRealTime() - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Simulator
This function runs the simulation with the display and in real time.
